sections.content:
C                Em7
I spend my time, watching
     G                              C
The spaces that have grown between us.
                      Em7

       G                               C
Oh the scars that come with the greenness.
                          Em7
And I gave my eyes to the boredom,
           G                      C
Still the seabed wouldn't let me in.
                                 Em7
And I try my best to embrace the darkness
G          C            Em7
In which I swim, oh the darkness... in which I swim.
C                           Em7
Now walking back, down this mountain,
    G                       C
The strength of a turnin' tide.
                            Em7
Oh the wind so soft, and my skin,
         G                    C
Yeah the sun was so hot upon my side.
                       Em7
Oh lookin' out at this happiness
   G                          C
I searched for between the sheets,
                       Em7
Oh feelin' blind, to realize,
G                           C
All I was searchin' for... was me.
   Em7    G                  C
Oh oh-oh, all I was searchin' for was me.
D
Oh yeah

        G                         C
Oh the comfort invested in my soul,
                              Em7
to feel the warmth, of his smile,
            G                  C
when he said, 'I'm happy to have you home.'
Em7          G                  C
Oh oh-oh, I'm happy to have you home.

title: Slow Dancing In A Burning Room
label: ultimate guitar

sections.title: Intro
sections.content:
John Mayer
"Slow Dancing In A Burning Room"
Tabbed by Dave Ross

         E A D G B E
         - - - - - -
E-       0 2 2 1 0 0
C#m7-    x 4 6 6 0 0
Aadd9-   5 7 7 6 0 0
Badd11-  7 9 9 8 0 0
F#m11-   2 4 4 2 0 0

C#m7  Aadd9  E

sections.title: Verse 1
sections.content:
*Capo 3*
Basic picking pattern        C  G/B Am7 D/F# G  G/F# Em7
e|----------------------| e|-0---3---0---2---3---3----3--|
B|---------X------------| B|-1---0---1---3---3---3----3--|
G|-----X-----X---X------| G|-0---0---0---2---0---0----0--|
D|-------X-----X--------| D|-2---2---2---0---0---0----2--|
A|-X--------------------| A|-3---2---0---0---2---2----2--|
E|----------------------| E|-X---X---X---2---3---2----0--|
I play CM7/B instead of G/B. I play the F# note in the D/F# with my thumb.
I prefer to play 7th chords in the chorus to add distinction, and I love G's.
C             G/B                Am7      G/B
   I took my love and I took it down
C              G/B                    Am7     G/B
   I climbed a mountain and I turned around
      C         G/B           Am7           G/B
And I saw my reflection in the snow covered hills
          C         G/B         Am7            G/B
Until the landslide brought me down

sections.title: Verse 2
sections.content:
C            G/B           Am7     G/B
Oh, mirror in the sky what is love
        C               G/B          Am7    G/B
Can the child within my heart rise above
      C                 G/B       Am7       G/B
Can I sail through the changing ocean tides
      C           G/B      Am7   G/B
Can I handle the seasons of my life
C            G/B               Am7        G/B
   mmm...            I don't know
C            G/B              Am7        D/F#

sections.title: Chorus
sections.content:
G          G/F#      Em7
Well, I've been afraid of changing cause I
C       G/B           Am7   D/F#
built my life around you
     G           G/F#      Em7
But time makes you bolder, children get older
    C         G/B     Am7   G/B
and I'm getting older too
C   G/B   Am7   G/B (repeat as necessary)
   (insert optional solo here)
C   G/B   Am7   D/F#
   (as solo finishes)
       G         G/F#       Em7
Well, I've been afraid of changing cause I
C         G/B          Am7   D/F#
built my life around you
     G             G/F#    Em7
But time makes you bolder, children get older
     C         G/B    Am7   G/B
and I'm getting older too
     C         G/B    Am7   G/B
Oh, I'm getting older too       Ah

            C         G/B           Am7           G/B
And if you see my reflection in the snow covered hills
       C              G/B         Am7    G/B
then a landslide will bring you down
            C           G/B          Am7          G/B
And if you see my relfection in the snow covered hills
Well...
   C              G/B       Am7    G/B

sections.title: Verse
sections.content:
G                 D/G
All day permanent red,
    C/G         G
the glaze on my eyes.
                  D/G
When I heard your voice,
    C/G                     G
the distance caught me by surprise again.
      D/G      C/G               G

    C             G
but fix your eyes on me,
                   C
I guess I'm all you have
                   G             D
and I swear you'll see the dawn again.

you'll always be my only guiding light.
